name: Security Chaos
description:
Security Chaos is a game where you play as a security system and you have to defend the facility against a group of people breaking and entering.

The game was made and optimized for a custom-made controller made by Giovanny Brugge.

The game is still playable using keyboard input, but with various issues, though you can still try it with keyboard, it won't be the wanted experience.

Keyboard controls:

1234 -> color sensor ->  Switch cameras and navigate the menu

WASD ->  toggle switch -> Choose specific trap to use using the light sensor

G -> light sensor -> Activated specified trap with the toggle switch

F -> temperature sensor -> Activate fire traps

(The keyboard controls are currently not optimized, and there might be issues  IE: some traps won't de-activate properly using keyboard controls)

In the main menu you have to wait a second every time you switch from menu, since there is a small delay in between.
